ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm
Class CommServer 

java.lang.Object
  ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm.CommServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIServer, SocketServer 
public abstract class CommServer
				
extends Object

Author:
Bala Maniymaran Created: 2010-08-11 The parent class of communication server of any communication protocol. All the servers implementing different communication protocols have to be extended from this class. Communication servers accepts new connections and messages. When a connection is made from a broker, it allows the connection and let messages to be received via the connection. But when a connection is made from a client, in addition to allowing messages to be received via the connection, the connection is also informed to the upper layer using registered ConnectionListenerInterface.

Constructor Detail

CommServer

public CommServer(NodeAddress serverAddress)
           throws CommunicationException
Constructor for the server. It parse the given serverURI into the serverAddress, but it does not actually create the server that accepts the connections and messages. It has to be handled in the constructors of the subclasses.

Parameters:
serverID - The ID of the server
serverURI - The URI of the server
Throws:
CommunicationException - When there is error is parsing the given URI
See Also:
NodeAddress.getAddress(String)

getConnectionListeners

public List<ConnectionListenerInterface> getConnectionListeners()

addConnectionListener

public void addConnectionListener(ConnectionListenerInterface connectListener)
Registers a connection listener with this server. Connection listeners must be informed by the server when a connection request is made by a new client. Broker connections are not informed to the connection listeners.

Parameters:
connectListener - The connection listener to be informed of new incoming client connections.

addMessageListener

public void addMessageListener(MessageListenerInterface msgListener)
Registers a message listener with this server. Message listeners are informed of all the messages received at this server.

Parameters:
msgListener - The message listener to be informed of incoming messages

shutDown

public abstract void shutDown()
                       throws CommunicationException
Throws:
CommunicationException
